resources.string: Use of the Paytm Platform/Paytm Services Please read the following terms and conditions carefully before registering on, accessing, browsing, downloading or using the Paytm website located at paytm.com, and all associated sites linked to paytm.com, or the Paytm mobile application or any similar platform (hereinafter collectively, the Paytm Platform run by One97 Communications Limited, having its registered office at First Floor Devika Tower, Nehru Place New Delhi – 110019 and headquartered at B-121, Sector-5, Noida – 201301 (hereinafter collectively, One97 or Paytm ) on any device and/or before availing any services offered by Paytm on the Paytm Platform which may include services such as recharge or bill payment, digital products, semi-closed wallet service and marketplace service or any other service that may be offered by Paytm on the Paytm Platform (hereinafter individually, and collectively, the Paytm Services). For the avoidance of doubt, it is clarified that these terms and conditions shall apply to all Paytm Services, whether offered by One97 or its affiliates.
